body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

To get the issue:
```console
spack install m4
```

And the error message will be:
 ```console
2 errors found in build log:
     543      CC       c-strncasecmp.o
     544      CC       clean-temp.o
     545      CC       cloexec.o
     546    In file included from /usr/include/signal.h:328,
     547                     from ./signal.h:52,
     548                     from /tmp/primrose/spack-stage/spack-stage-m4-1.4.18-j25l3ycw7ih65qtme45fo
            bghfvxjaxyn/spack-src/lib/c-stack.c:49:
  >> 549    /tmp/primrose/spack-stage/spack-stage-m4-1.4.18-j25l3ycw7ih65qtme45fobghfvxjaxyn/spack-src/
            lib/c-stack.c:55:26: error: missing binary operator before token "("
     550       55 | #elif HAVE_LIBSIGSEGV && SIGSTKSZ < 16384
     551          |                          ^~~~~~~~
     552      CC       close-stream.o
  >> 553    /tmp/primrose/spack-stage/spack-stage-m4-1.4.18-j25l3ycw7ih65qtme45fobghfvxjaxyn/spack-src/
            lib/c-stack.c:134:8: error: variably modified 'buffer' at file scope
     554      134 |   char buffer[SIGSTKSZ];
     555          |        ^~~~~~
     556      CC       closein.o
     557      CC       closeout.o
     558    make[3]: *** [Makefile:1910: c-stack.o] Error 1
     559    make[3]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

### Information on your system

```console
 spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.3
* **Python:** 3.9.7
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu21.10-skylake

```

Also I am using the compiler of my system:

```console
gcc (Ubuntu 11.2.0-7ubuntu2) 11.2.0
```

### Additional information

The spack-build-out.txt
